title: Wearable Devices and Body Response
description: This project explored wearable devices and how they can be used to visualize physiological responses. The data comes from a study that measured heart rate, skin temperature, and other attribues of participants during different stress conditions.

title: Bikewatching Visualization
description: An interactive map visualization of bike traffic in the Boston area during different times of the day. The data comes from Bluebikes publicly-available bicycle sharing program in the Boston area.

title: Power Outage Analysis
description: My final project for DSC 80, where I analyzed power outage data to find trends in time and location. The project included extensive data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, statistical inference, and predictive modeling.

title: My First Website
description: This is the page you're looking at right now! This was my first time creating a website from scratch, and I learned a lot about HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in the process. I will continue to update it as I complete projects.

title: Analysis of Loan Data and Patterns
description: Analyzed and processed a rich dataset of loan applications to identify patterns and anomalies, including implementing functions to detect logical paradoxes in the data. Applied data visualization techniques to explore trends.

title: Basic Song Recommender
description: Implemented a song recommender system using Python and pandas for analyzing Spotify data on Taylor Swift's discography; implemented features like song recommendations based on user preferences and a lyric search tool to identify songs by lyric matches.

title: Basic Image Processing Tool
description: Developed a Python-based image processing application, implementing advanced features like color manipulation, image rotation, and a K-Nearest Neighbors classifier without external libraries.

title: Analysis of the Global Data Science Community
description: Using the 2020 Kaggle Machine Learning & Data Science Survey, this project explored programming language trends, education-job role relationships, and industry compensation patterns. A regression model analyzed key factors influencing salaries, highlighting the complexity of data science career trajectories.

title: Analyzing Social Mobility and Political Ideology
description: This homework examined the relationship between social mobility and political ideology using economic and voting data. I applied regression analysis and hypothesis testing to identify correlations and geographic trends, gaining insights into how economic opportunity aligns with political preferences.
